string.text: Papers with records

The papers say that, according to the order of the head of the first department, the overpass “Pripyat-1” after sealing the transport gateway was filled with carbon dioxide with a certain admixture. At the same time, personnel were ordered to use chemical protection costumes with a closed breathing system.
Letter about the supply of "Products No. 62"

“In connection with abnormal phenomena, the transportation of product No. 62 in open areas is impossible. In these conditions, it is necessary to use the underground overpass Pripyat-1. The delivery scheme and subsequent conservation of the overpass is sent to the first department. ”
The folder with the order

The documents say about the evacuation of the production complex from the territory of the Jupiter plant to underground laboratories. The discussion of this issue was to take place in the laboratory building.
Supply schedule

“Supply Supply“ Products No. 62 ”: 14.07 - 20 (twenty) units, 1 (one) damaged; 21.07 - 32 (thirty -two) units, 2 (two) damaged; 28.07 - 26 (twenty -six) units, 1 (one) damaged. The report on the percentage of loss during transportation is sent to the administration of the plant. The copy is directed to the repair shop. "
Notebook
The result of the meeting: to all departments to focus on the evacuation of the production complex of the product No. 62.
Magazine on duty shift

“18:30 - the sealing of all P -1 sections has been completed. 19:00 - The sealing of the doors of the railway gateway is completed. 19:45 - The doors of the transport gateway are closed. To bring the mechanism of the gateway doors, it was required to include the auxiliary generator due to the planned de -energization of the overpass. 20:00 - chem. The workshop began uploading gas to overpass. 22:00 - Work on the conservation of the overpass is completed. All documentation is sent to the first department. ”
The scheme of the overpass

Scheme of the overpass "Pripyat-1". The scheme shows that it passes under the city of Pripyat. There are two notes on the diagram: “1. Seal the doors of the transport gateway ”and“ 2. Use gas from the chemical workshop. compounds for the conservation of the overpass. "
Changed insulator
This item was once an electric insulator. Now it has almost turned into an artifact, characterized by unstable properties. Most likely, it was he who was a source of alternating psi radiation.
Canifoli Bank
Bank of Canifoli used for soldering. A rare thing in the zone: as a rule, fragments of broken objects here are combined using isolation.
Packaging capacitors
The packaging of capacitors, which in themselves are not so rare in the zone. But the capacity declared on these details is so high that it is difficult to imagine their purpose.
Textolite basis

Textite is the basis of the printed circuit board. What the amateur radio engineer experiences at the sight of an untouched text-liter slab is comparable except with the writer's sensations above a clean sheet.
Box of transistors

A box of high -quality transistors - semiconductor parts that can generate, convert and strengthen electrical vibrations. The limit of dreams of radio engineering if this miraculously enters the zone.
A coil of copper wire

Copper is an excellent conductor - and, part -time, valuable non -ferrous metal. In view of this fact, such a wire is a great rarity: all the available copper reserves in the zone were found and handed over to the recyclable back in the mid-1990s.
The scanner of the presence of mutants

A complex of an abnormal activity scanner, a sensor of the presence of mutants (limited radius of action) and a record block. The device is equipped with a circuit breaker, which works after the accumulation of a certain amount of data.
Administrative documents

A folder with documents that contain purely administrative information. According to the latter, in connection with the order from the Central Laboratory, the technical documentation for a certain “Product No. 62” was transferred to the test workshop.
PDA black

Among the few messages, one attracts special attention thanks to the nickname of the sender - a jackal. “My man at the Research Institute will recommend you the head of the expedition. He will have to take your guys to guard the bunker, this will greatly facilitate the task. Remember: the customer wants any information about the work of objects with the “X” index in the hands of scientists. If at least something leaks, we are not tenants outside the zone. Do not let me down, black. ”
"Black box"
The Black Box, which survived the fall of the Skat-1 helicopter. It should contain encrypted information about the last minutes of flight.
Plastic explosives of a standard army model. Equipped with a five-second timing timer.
Explosives with a timer
Changed helm
PDA drunks
In the PDA there is a card marked near a half -steam - a clear cache - plus a couple of erotic photographs of rather low quality.
PDA bandit
The last message to the PDA: “Take this snag and get here, I have a specific bazaar to him. Get it to me anywhere. Will beicing - break off. All. Sultan. "

This PDA stores data on Morgan's clients, as well as the coordinates of the secret warehouse “Debt”, from where Morgan got weapons. The weapon went to the mercenaries; In addition, there is data on contacts with a certain Sultan. To cover the tracks, Morgan decided to transfer the location of the Freedom hitch. The mission was to be fulfilled by his accomplice - the mercenary, nicknamed the Griff. In addition, the CPC mentions the sensor, which should notify the “debt” in the event of the opening of the cache, and which only Morgan itself can turn off. These data will probably be interested in “duty” and “freedom”.
PDA Morgan

A note on the back of the old document: “Ghost, I take my things. Special thanks for the machine - I am without it without hands. In return, I leave a set of medicines from the doctor. I managed to lure the mercenary into the trap that was walking on my track, so I will not need them ... I hope. Now I am heading for a meeting with a fang: he managed to assemble a decoder. If you have time, we meet in an ordinary place. Shooter ".
Note to a ghost

A note on the sheet in the cage: “The shooter, I left the second decoder for any fireman in our cache on Pripyat. Now we are going with a ghost to the agricultural industry, we will quit an extra equipment here. If anything, take everything. Not a fluff! Fang ".
Note to the arrow

A note on the back of the old document: “Fang, I can't wait for you anymore - I have a whole pack on my tail. I'm going to the sarcophagus myself. I leave my happy trunk: with cartridges to it in no way. If I do not return, give it to the ghost and tell me, let him take it, an intelligent machine. Be! Shooter ".
Note by a fang

The memory module extracted from an unmanned intelligence apparatus. Novikov unlocked the module, opening access to the information that was collected by the scout: among other things, it contains diaper for three radio beacons.
Memory module (unlocked)
The memory module removed from the unmanned intelligence apparatus. Despite the collapse of the carrier, the memory module is operational - but, unfortunately, is blocked.
Memory module (blocked)

An old sheet with a schedule of posts; Four digits are visible from below: “1421”. On top of the old records by the marker it is written: “Lieutenant Sokolov V.I. In connection with the collapse of the helicopter, he proceeded to the evacuation point B205. Within two days, the evacuation did not take place, further stay at the point is associated with unjustified risk. He decided to leave the point and proceed to the mobile laboratory of the scientific expedition. The laboratory is located northeast of the evacuation point. ”
Sokolova
A plant that was part of an abnormally changed grove. The trees reacted rather aggressively to the invasion, but the plant itself has not yet shown dangerous properties.
Anomalous plant

The last message in the CPC is a message from Morgan. In fact, this is an order for the murder of a stalker by the name of Degtyarev. Several photos are attached to the message. At the end of the message, Morgan demands to erase all this information.
PDA mercenary

In the case of the device, the artifact detector, the battery and a powerful transmitter are together collected. This thing should scan anomalies, determining the number and type of artifacts that appeared in them. All information received should be automatically sent to scientists hoppers.
Anomalous activity scanner

The last entry on the PDA is sound: \ n “... wherever you go, each time you increase to the same place. Fog this damn ... It is impossible to get used to ... Chepurnaya disappeared, and meets. Strange. Maybe I found a way out? .. \ n the sixth day, the water came out ... and the colonel went crazy: two shots and a bullet in his forehead ... I'm now alone. One inside this fucking anomaly ... and it pulled me to arrange a break in communication with the headquarters! Could take it, huh? Pension, cottage, fishing - and there would be no “duty” ... But it is true, I wonder how everything would turn! .. Only to hell. Captain Tachenko is already dead for a long time ... And the General of the Debt Tachenko will leave now, soon ... in the upper tundra, her mother ... to places rich in game ... such justice. " \ n next the sound of a shot is heard, the recording breaks off.
CCP General Tachenko

The instructions describe how to use the "Product No. 62". It is especially emphasized that when aiming, one should not follow the adjustment to the wind, since these factors can be neglected by these factors at the range of targeted fire. \ n these documents should not fall into the wrong hands: they will clearly interest the Analysts of the SBU.
Instructions for "Product No. 62"

The notebook has a detailed description of the experiment on the directed effects of the psi-field on the object, which is located in another hemisphere of the Earth. A group of scientists on a ship in the Caribbean received a signal, but with distortions. The modulations were incomprehensibly distorted, as if “corrected” by someone. One of the working versions is based on the assumption of the fidelity of the theory of the noosphere, which supposedly brought these distortions. \ n these documents should not fall into the wrong hands: they will clearly interest the Analysts of the SBU.
Notebook on the experiment

The documents indicate the technical characteristics of the antenna and their difference from the predicted. On the back there is a note - it indicates that this documentation was executed in the K10 laboratory. \ n these documents should not fall into the wrong hands: they will clearly interest the Analysts of the SBU.
Rainbow emitter - main TTX

The documents refer to one of the side effects of research - the discovery of the ability of living beings to generate a directed psi radiation. In the process of research in the X16 laboratory, a biological radiator of the field was grown, de facto - a giant brain. \ n these documents should not fall into the wrong hands: they will clearly interest the Analysts of the SBU.
Research documents

The report refers to the study of biological samples sent from the K18 laboratory. Samples were exposed to an information field of varying degrees of intensity. The report describes in detail mutations of living organisms caused by such irradiation. \ n these documents should not fall into the wrong hands: they will clearly interest the Analysts of the SBU.
Sample

The document refers to the translation of the research group and the transfer of all materials to the laboratory with index X7, in which the problems of the influence of the noosphere will be studied. The composition of the research group: Lebedev N.A., Kalancha E.F., Suslov V.I. \ n these documents should not fall into the wrong hands: they will clearly interest the Analysts of the SBU.
Translation order

The last entry on the PDA reads: “I found an emergency generator on the sixth - technical - floor. He killed two hours to bring him to a more or less working condition. It would be worth trying to launch, only Serbin forbade something to do until he himself leads people "
CCP Barchuk
Red magnetic key-card. On one of the planes, the inscription "X8" is visible.
Red key -card - "x8"

There are many records that do not have a clear meaning in the CCP, but one still attracts attention: “Monolite turned to the listeners to him, and ordered to collect excess equipment and place in hidden from infidels, but to mark it with a sign. Those who hear the great monolith will come difficult times and will use his wisdom ... I conveyed the will of the monolith to my brothers, and indicated where to place supplies ... ”
PDA fighter "Monolith"
A set of tools "Young Technician". It is unlikely to suit work in which subtlety is needed, but in conditions of total lack of tools in the zone, economical equipment can be useful.
Tools for rough work
A good set of tools. Apparently, he is carefully selected by an experienced master "for himself, dear." Despite the years, all the tools are well preserved.
Tools for thin work

Professional set of tools for fine refinement of equipment; The inscription on the box says that it was made in the GDR. What is included in the kit is enough to carry out almost any work on tuning and calibration.
Calibration tools
Old magnetic key-card
Magnetic key-card belonging to the cardan. It was used for admission to the workshop, where the "product No. 62" was tested.
Documentation on "Product No. 62"

Documentation, which describes the principle of operation and the main performance characteristics of the electromagnetic installation. \ n in the documents includes a note: “The documentation must be returned to the Central Laboratory (X8). I will be busy, deliver it yourself. In the KBO "Yubileiny" use a magnetic card - you will go down on the elevator to minus the second floor, then you will figure it out yourself. I am attaching an access card. \ n N. Lebedev ”\ n these documents should not fall into the wrong hands: they will clearly interest the SBU analysts.
Yellow key -card - "x8"
Order No. 562
Internal order No. 423
Key «a»
The usual look, marked with the letter "A".
Key "B"
The usual look, marked with the letter "B".

The voice in one of the audio recordings sounds especially in the way: “Yeah, where are you, the mutants of Fueva! .. You climbed upstairs, and do you think that you won't get to you? .. Hahe! I look, you don't know that I have a personal move near the northern farm ... Well, everything, Tryndets, you, bastards! ”
PDA Noah

Among the many spam in the mailbox, the laptop contains the only message marked as important: \ n “Organize the camp at the waste processing station - everyone who participates in the case will arrive at you. Do not expect black: he will be with people on Jupiter, he has his own task. The military slowed the flights in the zone, so there would be no troubles from them. When stalkers find the way to Pripyat, we will send a guide and we will wait for the customer's people there - they will show where the laboratory is. \ n jackal "
Laptop of mercenaries

The last incoming message: \ n “So far we stick out near some old workshops. I sent two forward to explore the way to you. Until the courier from the customer will appear, we will wait here: here the air is clearly fresh. \ n tesak "
PDA mercenary hook
PDA mercenary of the ridge
A cylinder with a dangerous chemical substance of a neuro-paralytic action.
Ball with gas "Perin-B3"
The box is locked, a very cunning castle is mounted in it. Judging by the weight and roar when shaking, there is something inside.
Steel box

Record in the PDA: “Now I'm sure that the artifact is not below! It should be on the tree itself! It seems that you can climb from the hill. Now the main thing is that there are no monsters. Eh, it's a pity, after a quarrel with a cardan and a barge, I had to cross here alone .... But how I will drag an artifact, it will reach them, whom I had to listen! ”
PDA joker

In the last entry on the CCP, you feel the insult: “Cardan is an old drunk! As he swells, he cannot tear the back from the chair - well, yes, how can: “Here you have to look better” ... a moron! I also ran into us with a joker - we are young, like, too, a damn thing ... xhh! .. But the joker is also good: offended, grabbed a backpack and - Futu! - Up. While I reassured the cardan, dumped in an unknown direction. And what now, with an old idiot, thump? And this vodka is shit, PFU ... And so it all began! ”
PDA barges

Record No. 12. Studies will soon end ... In the camp they are already starting to suspect something. The capercaillie agreed with Danila to go to bloodsuckers ... I wonder when they guess? .. You need to sort the banks with blood: find out which are infected and hide the remaining ... someone is coming! .. Record No. 13 ... Perhaps the last. Everything is around! First, this curious idi-hunter, and now the capercaillie. It is naive to calculate that everything will get away with me. They will come for me. However ... What, in essence, is the difference? Hemoglobin -dependence will soon eat me. Better let them shoot - it's better than dying from illness ...
PDA tremor

Top secret. Order No. 562 beginning. Defense Headquarters of the Object No. 1 R. Yu. Didenko. \ n division of chemical protection No. 423 change the dislocation from the B103 sector to the A19 sector for the field tests of the chem. Mixtures "Perin-B3" in conditions especially close to combat. Ot. For prov. Testing: com. back. p/to p.p. Slavin. Ot. For transportation and safety - deputy. com. back. PC K.S. Valov.

Top secret. Order of Colonel P.P. Slavina. \ n according to this order to familiarize the personnel of the chemical protection unit No. 423 with the following information: \ N 1. Keys from the container with chemical. The mixture "Perin-B3" is at the disposal: p/c.p. Slavin (key a), PC K.S. Valov (key b). \ N 2. The procedure for building a column, starting from the head of the column: machine deputy car. com. TRA., car SOPR. No. 8, armored personnel carrier No. 1, transp. Machine No. 1, armored personnel carrier No. 3, car SOPR. No. 2, car com. back. P.P. Slavina. \ n copies of the order to hand for a PC K.S. Валову и ст/л Р.Б. Nazarenko.
The magnetic key-card of yellow with the inscription "X8" applied to one of the planes. \ n she should not get into the wrong hands, because it allows you to get into the secret laboratory.
PDA of the Messenger of the Sultan
The last message sent from the PDA is sound: “Sultan, I got this rotten fraer! He faded from me to the fullest! Now for a long time, a bitch, will remember how the boys are tuned! ”
It was once a storm of a dredger, but now before his eyes about half a formed artifact. Moreover, the artifact is quite unusual: it shines intensively, slightly radiates - and that's it.

The incoming message: \ n “I managed to agree on a weapon: this greedy will sell us supplies of his group. It will cost, in general, inexpensive, but you will have to drag on to the Jupiter. \ n vulture. "
